content.value: I should get back into it, but the later running levels using a bunch of squats killed my enjoyment (as far as exercise can be enjoyed). I wish there was a way to disable the squats only, instead of all leg exercises with buttons. Squats are the only one that makes my knee hurt.
content.html: I should get back into it, but the later running levels using a bunch of squats killed my enjoyment (as far as exercise can be enjoyed). I wish there was a way to disable the squats only, instead of all leg exercises with buttons. Squats are the only one that makes my knee hurt.
